summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new financial reporting features. All backend API endpoints working at 100% success rate. Frontend export functionality, month dropdown, and reports page working correctly. Fixed minor backend bug in yearly XLSX export.

minor_issues.issue: JavaScript padStart method used in Python code causing AttributeError
minor_issues.impact: Yearly XLSX export was returning 500 error
minor_issues.fix_applied: Changed str(m).padStart(2, '0') to str(m).zfill(2) in server.py line 854

passed_tests: Expense report data API endpoint (/api/reports/expenses/data) returns correct structure with rows, totals_by_category, and total
PDF export endpoint (/api/reports/expenses/pdf) downloads PDF with correct content-type and headers
XLSX export endpoint (/api/reports/expenses/xlsx) downloads XLSX with correct content-type and sheet name
Yearly XLSX export endpoint (/api/reports/expenses/xlsx-year) downloads multi-sheet XLSX file
All export endpoints protected with 401 authentication when no token provided
Expense-only filtering working - no income transactions in expense reports
Reports page (/app/reports) loads correctly with expense table, subtotals per category, and month total
Month dropdown functionality working with Indonesian month names (Januari, Februari, etc.)
Year and month selection in dropdown updates report data correctly
Export buttons on Reports page (PDF, Excel, Yearly Excel) are present and enabled
Export buttons on Dashboard page (PDF, Excel) are present and enabled
Table displays all required columns: Tanggal, Kategori, Subkategori, Deskripsi, Metode, Nominal
Category totals section displays subtotals per expense category
Month total section displays total expense amount for selected month
Navigation between Dashboard and Reports pages working correctly
Admin authentication and role verification working correctly
